response.overview: 60 AD , the island of Anglesey , Wales - Rhona, a young woman working towards becoming a druid. Together with her people, she has devoted her life to serving the gods and protecting their sacred site. When the news of a Roman attack reaches her village, Rhona has to decide whether to be loyal to her beliefs and face death or to flee with her best friend Mya. A Welsh-language production , filmed all over Dorset .
response.title: Menai
